mapper.select: SELECT user.user_id, user.name, users_mail_address.mail_address, user.date_of_birth, user.phone_number, user.gender FROM users.users as user INNER JOIN ( SELECT user_id, max(register_date) as register_date FROM users.users_mail_address GROUP BY user_id ) AS leatest on ( user.user_id = leatest.user_id ) INNER JOIN users.users_mail_address as users_mail_address on ( user.user_id = users_mail_address.user_id and leatest.register_date = users_mail_address.register_date ) WHERE user.user_id = #{identifier.value}

SELECT user.user_id, user.name, users_mail_address.mail_address, user.date_of_birth FROM users.users as user INNER JOIN ( SELECT user_id, max(register_date) as register_date FROM users.users_mail_address GROUP BY user_id ) AS leatest on ( user.user_id = leatest.user_id ) INNER JOIN users.users_mail_address as users_mail_address on ( user.user_id = users_mail_address.user_id and leatest.register_date = users_mail_address.register_date ) ORDER BY user.user_id;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users.users_mail_address (user_id, register_date, mail_address) VALUES (#{user.identifier.value}, now(), #{user.mailAddress.value});
